faqs.question: How secure is my data?
faqs.answer: We use enterprise-grade security technologies including end-to-end encryption, regular security audits, and compliance with global standards like SOC 2 and GDPR. Your data is always secure.

faqs.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without any hidden fees or penalties. We'll also help you export your data if needed.

faqs.question: How does the free trial work?
faqs.answer: The 14-day free trial gives you full access to all Professional plan features. No credit card required, and you can upgrade at any time during the trial.

faqs.question: What integrations are available?
faqs.answer: We support over 500 integrations with popular tools like Salesforce, Slack, Zoom and more. Our API also allows you to build custom integrations with any system.

faqs.question: Is an on-premise version available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer customized on-premise solutions for organizations with specific compliance requirements or who need to host data locally. Contact our sales team to learn more.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: At Sarh Al-Numou, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy aims to clarify how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our website or services.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We may collect personal information such as name, email, phone number, and other data you voluntarily provide when registering or contacting us.

usage.title: 2. Information Usage
usage.content: We use the information to improve our services, communicate with you, send updates or offers, and analyze website usage to enhance performance and user experience.

protection.title: 3. Data Protection
protection.content: We use strong security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies
cookies.content: We may use cookies to improve user experience and analyze browsing behavior. You can disable cookies from your browser settings.

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share data with service providers who help us deliver our services, but only according to data protection policies.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, update, or request deletion of your personal data. You can contact us to exercise these rights.

changes.title: 7. Privacy Policy Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify this policy at any time. Updates will be posted on this page with the last updated date.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: For any privacy policy inquiries, please contact us via email:

usage.title: 3. Website Usage
usage.content: It is prohibited to use this website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You may not attempt to hack, disrupt, or access unauthorized data.

liability.title: 4. Liability Limitations
liability.content: Sarh Al-Numou shall not be liable for any losses or damages resulting from your use of the website or reliance on any information contained within.
